bibl.title: Dedication of the Blemmyan interpreter Mochosak on behalf of King Isemne
bibl.note: Dedication to the gods Isis and Sarapis found during the 2019 excavation season at Berenike (BE-19 124/010). Late 4th / 1st half 5th c. AD. - Archaeological Analysis (J.R.). - Edition and Historical Commentary (R.A.). - Appendix. Note on O.Berenike 3.272: A Blemmyan Document?
